Parameters.Name: pLogOutput
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Write parameters and action summary to server message log (Boolean True = 1)

Parameters.Name: pStrictErrorHandling
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: On encountering any error, exit with major error status by ProcessQuit after writing to the server message log (Boolean True = 1)

Parameters.Name: pDim
Parameters.Prompt: REQUIRED: dimension name, parameter accepts delimited list and wildcards

Parameters.Name: pAttr
Parameters.Prompt: REQUIRED: attribute name, parameter accepts delimited list (separate with delimiter for multiple item e.g. Type&Active )

Parameters.Name: pPrevAttr
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: insert position (previous attribute) (Defaults to blank)

Parameters.Name: pAttrType
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: attribute type (e.g. A, S or N. If blank then assumed to be type=string)

Parameters.Name: pDelim
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: delimiter character for attribute list. (Defaults to & if blank)
